transcript:
David Harris: Hi, Sophia. This is David Harris from InfiniMeld. How are you today?

Sophia White: Hi, David. I'm doing alright. Just been busy with some reports. Thanks for calling.

David Harris: Good to hear. So, um, did you get a chance to look at the brochure we sent over?

Sophia White: Yeah, I glanced through it. It looked… okay, I guess. Can’t say I understood all of it.

David Harris: Oh, okay. Um, anything in particular you didn’t understand?

Sophia White: I’m not sure. It just seemed kind of dense. Anyway, I mentioned I’d be interested in a demo session.

David Harris: Right, the demo. Let me see… when would be a good time for you?

Sophia White: I have some availability next week. How’s your schedule looking?

David Harris: Next week? Uh, I think that might work. Do you have a specific day in mind?

Sophia White: Maybe Wednesday or Thursday afternoon? 

David Harris: Wednesday or… okay. I’m not sure if our demo specialist is available then, but I’ll check.

Sophia White: Alright. Just let me know when you can.

David Harris: Of course. So… did you have any other questions about the brochure?

Sophia White: Um, nothing specific off the top of my head. It was mostly about the features.

David Harris: Features, right. Our data warehouse solutions, they have a lot of features.

Sophia White: Yes, I noticed. Can you give me an example of how it would work for healthcare data?

David Harris: Oh, um, well, you can put the data in and then… it integrates it. You know?

Sophia White: Integrates it how? Like, what kind of data?

David Harris: Healthcare data, yeah. Patient records, analytics, that kind of thing.

Sophia White: That’s pretty broad. Any examples from your other clients?

David Harris: I might not have specifics right now, but, uh, I’m sure it’s helpful.

Sophia White: It would be useful to see something concrete. Maybe the demo will help with that.

David Harris: Yeah, the demo should clear a lot of that up. Yeah.

Sophia White: Okay. So, can you confirm the demo time soon?

David Harris: Oh, yeah. I’ll get back to you on that. Anything else you need?

Sophia White: Not really sure until I see the product in action. The brochure was just a bit too vague.

David Harris: Vague? Hmm, okay. I’ll let the team know.

Sophia White: So, do you have any pricing information you can share?

David Harris: Pricing… well, it depends. Customizable packages, you know?

Sophia White: I see. Can I get a range or something to work with?

David Harris: Um, the range varies a lot. We should probably discuss that in the demo.

Sophia White: Alright. It’s just that I need to budget for it, you know?

David Harris: Yeah, budgeting’s important. I’ll ask about it.

Sophia White: Good. Anything else you think I should know right now?

David Harris: Not really, um, I guess just get ready for the demo?

Sophia White: Sure. Do you need anything else from me?

David Harris: No, I think that’s it. Or, wait. Maybe… nope, that’s it.

Sophia White: Okay, then. I’ll wait for your confirmation on the demo time.

David Harris: Definitely. I’ll email you soon. Thanks, Sophia.

Sophia White: Thank you, David. Talk to you later.

David Harris: Bye.
